mapper.select: select id, plan_id, play_category_id, lottery_type, status, dict_amount_model, order_no, stage, stage_date, stage_num, stage_index, number, amount, win_amount, win_count, double_count, create_time, update_time from yjcycc_lottery.bs_order where id = #{id} limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into yjcycc_lottery.bs_order(plan_id, play_category_id, lottery_type, status, dict_amount_model, order_no, stage, stage_date, stage_num, stage_index, number, amount, win_amount, win_count, double_count, create_time, update_time) values (#{planId}, #{playCategoryId}, #{lotteryType}, #{status}, #{dictAmountModel}, #{orderNo}, #{stage}, #{stageDate}, #{stageNum}, #{stageIndex}, #{number}, #{amount}, #{winAmount}, #{winCount}, #{doubleCount}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update:
update yjcycc_lottery.bs_order
plan_id = #{planId},
play_category_id = #{playCategoryId},
lottery_type = #{lotteryType},
status = #{status},
dict_amount_model = #{dictAmountModel},
order_no = #{orderNo},
stage = #{stage},
stage_date = #{stageDate},
stage_num = #{stageNum},
stage_index = #{stageIndex},
number = #{number},
amount = #{amount},
win_amount = #{winAmount},
win_count = #{winCount},
double_count = #{doubleCount},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete from yjcycc_lottery.bs_order where id in (${ids})
